description: Manifest for your mod. Without it your mod won't be recognised my the game.

title.description: A readable name for the mod.

description.description: A readable description for the mod.

homepage.description: A URL where users can learn more about your mod.

metadata.description: Additional properties for this mod. You can later pull them from this mod's 'ModMetadata.metadata' object.

contributors.description: List of authors contributing to the creation of this mod.

role.description: The role the contributor played, for example 'Artist' or 'Programmer'.

url.description: A link to this author's personal page. It might be simple cardd, or github profile or anything else!

dependencies.description: A map of mod IDs which are mandatory dependencies, along with their version numbers. Without those mods present your mod won't be loaded.

optionalDependencies.description: A map of mod IDs which are optional dependencies, along with their version numbers. In case those are present they'll be loaded BEFORE your mod.

api_version.description: FNF's API version this mod makes use of.

mod_version.description: Current version of this mod (you can change this when exporting the mod).

license.description: A name of the licence under which this mod is distributed.
